ValidationRule.description: Ensures that the mobile number field is properly validated.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF( OR(ISCHANGED(Mobile_Number__c) && NOT(ISNULL(Mobile_Number__c)) && NOT(ISBLANK(Mobile_Number__c)) && !REGEX(Mobile_Number__c ,'^\\d{10,25}$'), ISNEW() && NOT(ISNULL(Mobile_Number__c)) && NOT(ISBLANK(Mobile_Number__c)) && !REGEX(Mobile_Number__c,'^\\d{10,25}$')),true,false)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Invalid format entered for mobile number. The minimum number of digits should be 10
